articles.title: Taylor Swift Shakes Off Frozen Hand Mid-Show For “Scotland’s Biggest Ever Stadium Concert” - Deadline
articles.description: 73,000 fans attended what the star told the crowd was the biggest stadium concert in Scottish history.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift wowed the Scottish crowd on her first UK tour date Friday evening, earning five-star reviews across the board for her three-and-a-half-hour performance in Edinburgh.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Danish PM Mette Frederiksen assaulted by man in Copenhagen square - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Police arrest one man and open investigation into incident in Kultorvet square that left prime minister ‘shocked’.
articles.content:
Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen was hit by a man in central Copenhagen, her office has said.
The 46-year-old was shocked by the incident on Friday evening in the capitals Kultorvet square, t… [+3849 chars]
